title: Drugs - The Straight Facts - Designer Drugs (2004) (97p) [Inua].
description:
Series: Drugs - The Straight Facts
Title:  Designer Drugs
Author: M. Foster Olive
Publisher: Chelsea House Publishers
ISBN-10: 0791076385
ISBN-13: 978-0791076385

Learn about the dangers of synthetically created substances that mimic the effects of controlled hallucigens, stimulants, and depressants. Drugs are everywhere--on our streets, in our homes, and in our schools--but straight facts about drugs are not. Drugs: The Straight Facts fills this void with candid discussions that emphasize a historical and scientific approach to learning about drugs
